reviews.review: I used to like this game, but Valve don't care anymore for the honest players at all. They don't even ban anymore after positive cheating verdicts. This is a shame. I won't waste even 1 cent in this game until they resolve to ban cheaters definitely. Also, don't recommend this game for anyone else.
Well you see its vary simple, my father was a gamer but he liked the saw and revolver

Finger Weg!

Zwei Möglichkeiten:
- Entweder Valve ist zu blöd ein einigermaßen balanciertes Matchmaking zu programmieren
- Oder das Game ist einfach nur Smurf/Cheater versäucht.

So oder so empfindet man keinen Spaß beim spielen, sondern einfach nur den drang noch ein Game zu machen in der Hoffnung, ein kleines bisschen Dopamin abzubekommen. Am besten garnicht erst damit anfangen.

Neuer Content sieht so aus: Skins für Ingame-Chicken. Wow.

i hate this game so much it has ruined my life relationships gone parents disappointed and most importantly savings gone it has turned me from a mostly happy fun loving person to a greasy basement dweller please god dont let your kids play this.

I used to play this game a lot like 5 years ago and I would totally have reccomended it. I started replaying it recently and if you are going to play free to play then don't because its full of hackers. If you are primed then I still don't recommend it because every game I have played someone either griefs or leaves and it feels like it is a lot more full of smurfs than it used to. Unless you have good people to play with its not fun and many of the people are toxic.
